pr_title: Auth multi-user fix and new API endpoints

timeline.message:
Auth multi-user fix and new API endpoints WIP

The current polling option did not handle multiple users polling at the
same time. This PR should fix that.

It also adds more API endpoints to make the auth process less opaque and
more controllable.


Signed-off-by: Simon Bennetts <psiinon@gmail.com>
